definitions.title: n.pr.f.
definitions.body: Leah, elder daughter of Laban, and wife of Jacob (perh. = wild-cow, Ar. llo0, (lliy) [cf. [[רָחֵל]] ewe], Dl:Prol. 80 RS:K 219 and (doubtfully) Nö:ZMG xl. 1886, 167; also Gray:Heb. Names, 96; others as Hpt:GGN 1883, 100 comp. As. li’at, in sense mistress; on poss. relation of [[לֵאָה]] to [[לִוֵי]] v. [[לִוֵי]]);—mother of Reuben, Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issachar, Zebulun and Dinah; Ge 29:16, Ge 29:17, Ge 29:23, Ge 29:24, Ge 29:25, Ge 29:30, Ge 29:31, Ge 29:32 (cf. vv:Ge 29:33, vv:Ge 29:34, vv:Ge 29:35) Ge 30:9 + 15 t. Ge 31, Ge 32, Ge 33:1, Ge 33:2, Ge 33:7, Ge 34:1, Ge 35:23, Ge 35:26, Ge 46:15, Ge 46:18, Ge 49:31, Ru 4:11; LXX L(e)ia.
